* Are passionate about solving challenging problems in a fast-paced and ever-changing agile environment.


**In addition, you..**
* Are a positive person by nature and have a passion for what you do, putting teamwork and collaboration above all else?
* Have great communication skills and appreciate a culture where feedback sharing is encouraged to achieve not only to the success of the team, but also seen as essential to the improvement of personal and professional development.
* Take great pride in your ability to grasp complex business scenarios and translate them into solutions with high quality, clean and performant code
* Believe in yourself and your own abilities, but also appreciate that there is an endless ocean of new things to learn and take on board, cherishing the opportunity to do so


 Join us on this exciting journey, where you'll have the opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge projects and expand your skills alongside a collaborative and dynamic team. Apply today and let your passion for Frontend Development take flight!  🚀

title: Personlig assistent sökes till en ung man i Tullinge
description:
En ledande aktör inom personlig assistans och ledsagning/avlösarservice i Sverige .
   

  

 Nu söker vi på Nordström Assistans Dig som har hjärtat på rätt ställe och som vill tillgodose en människas liv med särskilda insatser.
   

  

**Vad innebär tjänsten?**
 Vi söker nu en personlig assistent till en tjugoårig man med duchennes muskeldystrofi som är bosatt i Tullinge, Botkyrka. Arbetsuppgifterna innefattar bland annat tyngre lyft, personlig hygien, måltider/matlagning, handräckning, på- och avklädning. Det finns även flera hjälpmedel i kundens hem, såsom lift, rullstolar av olika slag och ortos. Denna kund har ett stort intresse för att spela spel, gå på bio, shoppa, teknik, vetenskap och IT.
   

  

 Tjänsten är på heltid och arbetstiderna ser ut som följande: 08:00-17:00 på måndagar, tisdagar, torsdagar och fredagar samt 08:00-16:50 på onsdagar.
   

  

**Omfattning:** 
 Heltid.
   

  

**Antal tjänster:** 
 1.
   

  

**Tillträde:** 
 Enligt överenskommelse. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten tillsätts så snart som möjligt.
   

  

**Om dig** 
 -
   

  

 Som personlig assistent ser vi gärna att du är samarbetsvillig, lyhörd, ansvarstagande, flexibel och en bra lagspelare. Viktigaste är att det finns personkemi mellan dig som sökande och kunden. Detta kan komma till att bli avgörande vid det slutgiltiga urvalet.
   

  

**Det Är Meriterande Om Du**
* Har en vårdrelaterad utbildning,
* Innehar B-körkort,
* Har tillgång till egen bil.


**Det Är Krav På Att Du**
* Har erfarenhet inom vård och omsorg eller personlig assistans,
* Har flytande kunskaper i det svenska språket, i såväl tal som skrift,
* Kan uppvisa ett giltigt utdrag ur ditt belastningsregister från Polisen vid en eventuell anställning.
* Är rökfri,
* Inte har pälsdjursallergi.


***Rekryteringsprocessen***
 Din ansökan kan komma att läsas av personal inom Nordström Assistans, av kund och dennes anhöriga och/eller samordnare. Din ansökan kan komma att delas med våra systerbolag om din profil matchar en annan tjänst inom Team Olivia. Urval kan ske löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Tveka därför inte att skicka in din ansökan idag!
   

  

****Vid eventuell****
***anställning***
 För anställning hos oss på Nordström Assistans behöver du ha ett BankID och godkänner att använda ditt BankID i tjänsten. En förutsättning för att påbörja en anställning hos oss är att du som söker kan uppvisa giltig ID-handling och/eller lämna in personbevis samt eventuella dokument som styrker rätten till arbete i Sverige. Personbevis kan du enkelt ladda ned på Skatteverkets hemsida. För att kunna jobba som personlig assistent behöver du vara minst 18 år.
   

  

 Om du vill arbeta hos denna kund behöver du kunna uppvisa ett utdrag ur brottsregistret. Det är viktigt att du redan nu beställer ett utdrag från Polisen, då deras handläggningstid kan variera. Du beställer enkelt med BankID via denna länk: https://polisen.se/tjanster-tillstand/belastningsregistret/barn-med-funktionsnedsattning/blanketter---barn-med-funktionsnedsattning/
   

  

***För dig med anställningsstöd***
 Nordström Assistans är ett inkluderande företag. Vi välkomnar alla sökanden och även du som har rätt till någon form av anställningsstöd genom arbetsförmedlingen. Det är frivilligt att ange denna information i din ansökan, alternativt kan du även meddela detta vid en eventuell intervju.
   

  

***Nordström Assistans***
*Vi på Nordström Assistans är övertygade att med rätt hjälp och förutsättningar kan man nå mer. Vi vill förändra, förbättra och skapa vägen till en bättre tillvaro. Vi har funnits sedan 1998 och erbjuder idag personlig assistans i hela Sverige och utgår från regionalkontoren i Stockholm, Gotland, Malmö, Jönköping och Gällivare. Vår framgång vilar på våra medarbetare och vi söker dig som vill vara en del av vårt team!*
*Vi följer kollektivavtal mellan Kommunal/Vårdföretagarna.*
*Du hittar mer information på https://www.nordstromassistans.se*

title: German-speaking Technical Inside Sales Representative
description:
If you want to be part of building a new department as a technical inside sales representatives within an international company, you've found the right position for you. In this role, you will work with both short and long sales processes divided into geographical areas. You will have your own clients whom you will drive sales with from the office, and you'll have the opportunity to grow within an already large but rapidly expanding company.
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Solna
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Sales
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 According to agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Recruitment
   




**About the role**

 The client works with IT-based security solutions and is a growing player in the market. They are expanding their sales operations with an inside sales team focusing on small and medium-sized enterprises. You will be responsible for building long-term relationships with a focus on customer satisfaction, initially with existing customers, but as you become more experienced, you will also work with your own prospects. You will have the opportunity to be involved in the entire process alongside the customer and support them from small individual assignments to large, complex installations and solutions.
   




**Work tasks**
  
* Manage a significant portion of the company's accounts and drive growth
  
* Build long-term relationships with new and existing customers
  
* Proactively work with customers to easily meet their needs as they arise
  
* Explore new solutions to help the customer find the best solution for their problem
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* Has relevant experience in sales of, e.g., SAAS/access control solution/security installer
  
* Has at least completed secondary education, preferably in technology
  
* High proficiency in both spoken and written German and/or Dutch as it will be used in daily work
  
* Someone who is based in Stockholm, Sweden
   

 It is also highly meritorious if you have knowledge in other southern European languages.
  


  


 To succeed in this role, you have the following personal qualities:
   

 We believe that you have the ability to drive your work forward independently, and you are not afraid to pick up the phone and call the customer. You prefer to ask one question too many, and you enjoy working together with others. We see that you have high ambition and are eager to develop and learn. We will focus on the following personal qualities during the recruitment process:
 


  

  
* Results-oriented
  
* Structured
  
* Service-minded
  
* Self-driven
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
 



 When you apply to this application, you will get hired by our partner. This means that you can relax while we take care of the application process.
   




**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Sofia Wahren or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on ste03@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15103570

title: Groups, Meetings & Events Sales Coordinator- Part-time 50%
description:
**Hilton Stockholm Slussen is recruiting for a Groups, Meetings & Events (GM&E) Sales Coordinator, Part-time 50% to join our team at the hotel. You will join an international organization with the possibility of an international career. Hilton is a global leading hotel company with over 7000 hotels in more than 100 countries. Hilton Stockholm Slussen is located with a view over the old town. In addition to the 289 guest rooms and large meeting & event facilities, we operate bar and restaurants.**
 As a GM&E Sales Coordinator you will maximise revenue opportunities in the area of group reservations, meetings and events by driving sales leads and increasing conversion. You will interact frequently with guests and customers with the intention of earning repeat and expanded business.
   

  

**To thrive with us we see that you enjoy and want to:**
* Receive and convert incoming enquiries to achieve targets and maximize revenue.
* Seek opportunities to increase sales and conversions within the Team.
* Manage an event schedule to maximize yield.
* Focus on a consistently executed up-selling approach.
* Build strong relationships with customers to fully understand their needs.
* Execute high level of customer service.
* Arrange and carryout Hotel show rounds to strive to exceed guest expectations.
* Ensure good communication and relations with other departments of the hotel to exceed guest expectations.
* Ensure the complete administration and execution of all planned events.
* Participate in hotel promotional activities.
* Control of invoices, payment and commission.


**Qualifications – What are we looking for:**
 Experience from an inhouse sales or reservations role or similar preferably within hotels. It would be beneficial but not necessary if you have experience with organising meetings and events in an upscale hotel.
   

  

 It will be beneficial with a degree in a relevant field.
   

  

 For this role you will need to speak, write and read Swedish and English fluently.
   

  

 You see yourself as a person with good organisational, communication and administration skills. You have a positive attitude with a hands-on approach enjoying a busy environment where change is part of your daily work.
   

  

 You thrive on delivering a high level of customer service where telephone and email is your main work tool. You will at the same time enjoy meeting people in person presenting to prospective customers showing the hotel and conference areas.
   

  

 Beneficial if you have worked with and have knowledge of computer systems Delphi and Opera.
   

  

**Other information:**
 Working hours are mainly Monday – Friday. Part-time 50% contract with 6 months’ probation period. Interviews will be held ongoing, so please submit your application in English by following the link.
   

  

**What will it be like to work for Hilton?**
 Hilton is the leading global hospitality company, spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels. For over a century, Hilton has offered business and leisure travellers the finest in accommodations, service, amenities and value. Hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its global brands. Our vision “to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality” unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day. We are a purpose led company with a strong focus on sustainability.
   

  

 Our amazing Team Members are at the heart of it all! Thrive at Hilton is our Team Member Value Proposition. It supports the well-being and performance of our Team Members with industry-leading benefits, recognition and support to meet your professional needs. We are committed to creating a diverse environment where every team member can thrive and be their authentic self.
   

  

 Hilton Stockholm Slussen has been listed on the Great Place to Work Sweden as the only hospitality company for our great culture, benefits and team member engagement.
   

  

 As a Hilton team member, you will enjoy access to GO Hilton, team member travel program with discounted rates at hotels all over our beautiful world.
   

  

 Other team member benefits offered at Hilton and Hilton Stockholm Slussen includes:
   

  

* Hilton University courses including development programs such as Harvard for your development.
* Access to ComPsych Employee Assistance Program with free local counselling for mental wellness, family and other personal problem as well as support with financial advice
* Local health insurance
* Local pension benefits
* Free access to the local gym
* Parental Pay


**Work Locations**
 Hilton Stockholm Slussen Hotel
   

  

**Schedule**
 Part-time
   

  

**Brand**
 Hilton Hotels & Resorts
   

  

**Job**
 Catering and Event Services

title: Senior Statistical Programmer
description:
**Global Biostatistics**
**Home-based, office-based, hybrid options available**
**Join us on our exciting journey!**
 The Global Biostatistics (Data Sciences, Safety & Medical) team at IQVIA are experienced in submissions for all major regions; working together with key groups such as, Global Regulatory Affairs, Safety, Project and Data Management, and Medical Writing, to drive efficiency and accountability.
   

  

 IQVIA Biostatistics helps interpret and draw inferences from data collected on patients as they progress through a clinical trial and serves as the bridge between data capture and reporting.
   

  

 We have one of the largest Biostatistics departments within the industry of around 1,100+ staff, to which we engage the full range of industry-leading resources and expertise spanning all study phases and therapeutic areas.
   

  

**Job Overview:**
 As a Senior Statistical Programmer, you will be given access to cutting-edge, in-house technology and opportunities to work on global projects across a variety of therapeutic areas.
   

  

 Thanks to our development opportunities and mentoring at all levels, you will be able to progress your long-term career in the direction you choose.
   

  

 You will provide experienced technical expertise to develop process methodology for the department to meet internal and external clients’ needs.
   

  

 You will plan and coordinate the development of integrated programming solutions, serving the full spectrum of statistical programming needs, along with providing technical expertise and leadership to the department and provide internal consulting services, including specifications and user needs analysis for complex project or client requirements.
   

  

 Acting as a lead on studies, you will directly communicate with internal and client statisticians and clinical team members to ensure appropriate understanding of requirements and project timelines and support the training of new or junior team members. As well as, estimating programming scope of work, manage resource assignments, communicate project status and negotiate/re-negotiate project timelines for deliverables.
   

  

**Requirements:**
* Bachelors or Masters’ in Computer Science, Mathematics or equivalent
* 5+ years Statistical Programming experience within the Life-Science industry
* Experience in SAS® Base, and good knowledge of SAS® graph and SAS® Macros
* Excellent knowledge of CDISC standards (SDTM and ADaM)
* Excellent application development skills
* Strong understanding of clinical trial data and extremely hands on in data manipulations, analysis and reporting of analysis results.
* Experience as technical team lead, directly engaging clients and coordinating tasks within a programming team
* In-depth knowledge of applicable clinical research regulatory requirements, i.e. Good Clinical Practice
* (GCP) and International Conference on Harmonization (ICH) guidelines


**Join IQVIA to see where your skills can take you**
* Global exposure
* Variety of therapeutic areas
* Collaborative and supportive team environment
* Access to cutting-edge and innovative, in-house technology
* Excellent career development and progression opportunities
* Work-Life Balance, with a strong focus on a positive well-being


**Unleash your potential!**
 It takes passion to make the extraordinary possible for patients. Our culture of innovation and collaboration enables us to explore new possibilities and help improve health around the world.
   

  

 When you join our diverse, global team, you’ll harness the power of unparalleled data, advanced analytics, cutting-edge technologies, and deep healthcare and scientific expertise to drive healthcare forward.
   

  

 IQVIA is a leading global provider of advanced analytics, technology solutions and clinical research services to the life sciences industry. We believe in pushing the boundaries of human science and data science to make the biggest impact possible – to help our customers create a healthier world. Learn more at https://jobs.iqvia.com

title: Senior marketing automation specialist
description:
**Join our Martech team at Miltton** 




 Miltton is expanding its martech expertise and we are looking for professionals to join our dynamic team in Stockholm. At Miltton, you will find a human-centric culture and a diverse group of talented individuals from various business fields to collaborate with and learn from. We are dedicated to our clients' businesses, driving responsible and impactful growth through customer engagement marketing.
 



  





**Your Role** 




 As our new Senior marketing automation specialist, you will be a key player in delivering advanced marketing technology solutions for our clients across different industries. You are proficient in working with APIs, webhooks, SDKs, and various innovative technologies, and you understand how different channels and systems work together to achieve business goals. You believe in a customer-centric approach and value technology as a driver for innovation and efficiency in customer engagement marketing.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Lead or participate in marketing automation, CDP (Customer Data Platform) and other martech-related projects
* Advise clients on the implementation and optimization of modern marketing technology and tools
* Provide expert consultation on integrating marketing technologies, including APIs, webhooks, and SDKs, into clients' existing systems
* Act as a bridge between clients' marketing and IT teams, ensuring seamless implementation and usage of marketing technologies
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to address clients' digital challenges and unlock their full potential



  





**What we're looking for** 



* A minimum of 5+ years of experience in martech: such as implementation of marketing automation platforms, customer data platforms (CDP), or related systems
* Proven ability to demonstrate business acumen and digital expertise in previous roles
* Hands-on experience working and developing within marketing automation, CDP, and other martech systems.
* Experience working with best-of-breed technology (e.g. Braze, Iterable, Mparticle etc.) is an advantage, but suite experience (e.g. Salesforce, Adobe) is also valued
* A sales-minded, results-oriented approach with excellent communication and collaboration skills
* The ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and manage multiple stakeholders
* A curious mindset with a strong desire to keep learning and adapting to modern technologies



  





 If this sounds like you, we would love to hear from you! We will begin interviewing suitable candidates immediately and will close recruitment once we have found the right fit.
 



  





 Please send in your application with CV and salary request by the September 3, 2024.
 



 For questions, contact: mattias.andersson@miltton.com

title: Redovisningsansvarig
description:
Vi söker en driven, flexibel och nyfiken person för en rekrytering till snabbväxande bolag. Vi tror att du har 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet efter din utbildning och är redo att ta ett kliv upp från befintlig tjänst som redovisningskonsult/-ekonom. Denna tjänst utgår från kontoret i Täby och rapporterar direkt till VD.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 




 I din roll kommer du att ansvara för redovisningen för tre av koncernens bolag. Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:
 


* Löpande redovisning
* Kontoavstämningar och analyser
* Hantering av kundreskontra och leverantörsreskontra
* Månads- och årsbokslut
* Moms- och skattedeklarationer
* Upprättande av årsredovisningar
* Upprättande av inkomstdeklarationer
* Koncernrapportering
* Ad-hoc projekt



 Du kommer att vara kontinuerligt att arbeta med att utveckla och förbättra rutiner och processer för redovisnings- rapporterings- och bokslutsarbetet.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer** 



* Civilekonomexamen eller motsvarande examen inom ekonomi
* Två års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet, redovisningsbyrå är starkt meriterande
* Bevisad erfarenhet av att driva projekt
* Goda IT-kunskaper och är van användare av Excel



  





 Som person är du noggrann, initiativtagande och flexibel. Vi söker en glad och positiv person som vill vara en del av ett sammansvetsat team och som känner att service är en naturlig del. Trivs du i en miljö som ständigt utvecklas och gillar att driva förbättringar så kan detta vara helt rätt tjänst för dig!
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Tycker du att detta låter som en spännande tjänst för dig? Ansök genom att klicka på ”ansök nu” redan idag. Frågor? Hör av dig till Julia Ternhem på
 
 julia.ternhem@fand.se

title: Senior Back End Engineer
description:
*Learnster is a cutting-edge learning management system committed to revolutionizing how organizations approach employee development. Our human-centered approach blends innovative technology and AI with a dedication to empowering individuals and fostering learning cultures. Learnster comprises 45 engaged individuals, 200+ customers, and users across 30+ countries.*  



*Join us on our trailblazing journey to reshape the future of workplace individual learning!*

  

**Job description**

  

Are you a senior back-end developer with a devops mindset? Do you enjoy building scalable SaaS-products using Python and AWS? If so, you might be exactly the one we're looking for!

  

We're on the hunt for a senior back-end developer who wants to join us on our quest to help employees of our customers in their individual learning and growth journeys! We believe that you're a skilled engineer with a passion for technology and a drive to solve customer problems. We believe that you have a DevOps mindset where you care about the entire lifecycle of a solution, from ideation to development and deployment, and that you do that with open eyes and a learning mindset.

  

**Your role will include**


As a back-end developer at Learnster, you’ll be involved in the whole development lifecycle, where you contribute with everything from ideation and solution design to development, testing and deployment.


You'll do this in close collaboration with other developers, designers and product managers since we believe that the best solutions come when people with different skills and background work together finding the best solutions.

  

**To thrive in this role you'll have the following skills and experience**

* **Back-end development experience:** *Experience as a back-end developer, with a strong portfolio of solutions developed using Python and AWS.*
* **Python Development:** *Solid experience in Python development, specifically with the Django framework.*
* **Database design and development:** Experience using both relational and non-relational databases and experience writing SQL code to retrieve and modify data.
* **AWS Solution Development:** *Experience in designing and implementing solutions on AWS, leveraging both AWS managed services and cloud-agnostic technologies.*
* **DevOps Mindset:** *A strong understanding of DevOps principles, with a focus on the entire lifecycle of a software solution. This includes a keen interest in why we build solutions, how we build them, and ensuring they perform optimally once deployed.*

**What We Offer**

* *An exciting journey in a scale-up with strong investors*
* *Flexible work arrangements (remote/on-site)*
* *Health and wellness benefits*
* *Continuous learning opportunities within a vibrant, innovative team*
* *Six weeks of paid vacation plus 3 extra free days per year*
* *A culture that values diversity and promotes personal development*


We look forward to meeting you!

  

*Join a fast-growing and awarded SaaS company, where you will play a key role in shaping Learnster’s future.*

  

*At Learnster, you will work with passionate and ambitious colleagues, ready to take ourselves, our team, and the company to the next level!*

  

Please send your application in if you think that you would be a good fit for this position and if you think that Learnster might be a place for you!  

  



We look forward to meeting you!

title: Network Infrastructure Engineer
description:
### **Assignment Description**


* Configure and install various network devices and services (e.g., routers, switches, load balancers, VPN, QoS).
* Perform network maintenance and system upgrades including service packs, patches, hot fixes and security configurations.
* Traffic Engineer usage and monitor performance and ensure system availability and reliability.
* Monitor system resource utilization, trending, and capacity planning.
* Provide Level-3 support and troubleshooting in cooperation with operations team to resolve issues.
* Work within established configuration and change management policies to ensure awareness, approval and success of changes made to the network infrastructure.
* Select and implement policies, and procedures in conjunction with the company’s security team.
* Develop, build and manage (DevOps) Network Architected solutions for H&M Group globally (e.g., routing, switching, SD-WAN, ACI Data Centre Environment).
* Participate in assessing existing implementations, designing future state, and building transition plans for implementation of network infrastructure features.
* Being an advisor in designing, planning and implementing Network Infrastructure projects in the respective technology area.
* Assist with advice for high priority incidents.
* Cooperate and coordinate with stakeholders within business, security, services and network related products/areas.
* Contribute to the Unit and Product Area strategy and OKRs.
* Be responsible to keep our production Network Design setups documented and ensure that the required knowledge is available for other product teams.
* Take ownership and end to end responsibility for the solutions/functions within product team.
* Constant improvement of the solutions (automation, upgrades, LCM, etc.).
* Follow all Service Management Processes including but not limited to Change, Configuration, Problem and Incident Management Processes.
* Striving for cost efficiency and automation based on trends and new technologies for Network solutions during our journey towards the Cloud based solutions.
* Provide technical engineering and best practices concerning the overall design of the organization’s network infrastructure.
* Stay current with industry trends and best practices, making recommendations as needed to help our company develop and deliver cloud future state architectures and roadmaps.

  


**Required Skills**


* Deep understanding and experience in IP – Networking.
* Network foundations (LAN, WAN, DNS, NAT, VPN, routing).
* Deep understanding of networking protocols (e.g., IPSEC, HSRP, BGP, OSPF, 802.11, QoS).
* Hands-on experience with monitoring, network diagnostic and network analytics tools.
* Expertise in Cloud networking.
* Ability of network troubleshooting (pcap, Wireshark, NetFlow).
* Experience and understanding of developing with DevOps methodology.

  


**Technical Skills**


* Proven hands-on network engineering experience.
* CCNP or higher (CCIE and/or CISSP highly valued).
* Solid understanding of the OSI or TCP/IP model.
* University degree in Computer Science or a related subject.
* Basic understanding of Agile methodology and tools used (Jira/Confluence).
* Understanding or experience within Azure cloud.
* Scripting, programming experience (e.g. Python).
* At least basic knowledge or experience of ServiceNow.
* Network automation experience.
* Experience in network as a code concept.
* Experience and understanding of Network Security products (IPS, proxy, firewall, reverse-proxy, load balancing).
* English.

title: Cloud DevOps Engineer
description:
**Our client in the automotive industry is currently seeking a skilled Cloud DevOps Engineer to join their Platform Observability team. You will play a key role in supporting the observability stack used by application teams. The team works according to agile and scrum principles.** **You will be part of our client’s Developer Experience organization with the mission to create a great developer experience by providing platform products that support high performance and productivity for their software engineers. Every software engineer and software team at our client’s organization is a potential customer, and they are focused on understanding their customers and how they can help them be successful and productive.**


### **Responsibilities**


* Work closely with application teams to ensure application reliability and performance.
* Promote modern DevOps ways of working.
* Support shared DevOps toolchains at an enterprise scale.
* Engage in both development and operational work.
* Participate in on-call duties once every 5th week.

  


**Technical Skills**


* Experience integrating and supporting cloud-native observability tools like ElasticSearch/OpenSearch, InfluxData, and Azure Monitor.
* Familiarity with working in a product-oriented organization focused on Team Objectives and OKRs.
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent.
* Experience as a DevOps Engineer.
* Experience with Git Version Control.
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken.
* Expertise in monitoring and alerting systems using ElasticStack, InfluxData, and Grafana.
* Strong scripting and automation skills, with experience in Kubernetes, Terraform, and Python.

  


**Desired Skills**


* Tech-savvy, self-driven, and outcome-oriented with a \*-as-code mentality.
* Resilient and strategic thinker with a focus on enterprise-scale, developer experience, and micro-service architecture.
* Experience working closely with application teams to integrate observability tools into the software development life cycle.
* Hands-on experience with excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
* Ability to actively participate in discussions with stakeholders and team members.
* Strong communication skills, with proficient writing abilities and teamwork capabilities.

title: Data Analyst
description:
**We are looking for a Data Analyst, you will perform data analysis based on measurement data from test / field to follow up on battery usage including battery degradation and quality related issues. The insights will be used to support development of battery systems including design both HW and SW components. An important part of the work is to develop mathematical models for prediction of battery behavior** **with special focus on battery ageing. You will also define requirements for data collection together with component owners and system architects. Your results will be used by many internal stakeholders within the company including R&D, but also teams working with quality, service, and aftermarket. You will also contribute to an increased usage of data driven development within the company in general and facilitate interactions with the rest of the data community in the company.**


### **Requirements**


* Master’s degree in engineering, preferably within Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science or similar with a couple of years of relevant experience.
* You will need skills in Python and scientific packages like NumPy, Pandas etc. and experience in building data pipelines,  

data transformation and data visualization.
* Create a great atmosphere for innovative solutions.
* Version control tools for collaborative development (Git).
* Familiarity with working on modern cloud-based environments.
* AI/Machine learning and Databases (SQL).
* DevOps tools such as Kubernetes and Docker.
* Experience with CI/CD tools such as Tekton and ArgoCD.
* BI tools like Power BI or similar.

title: Enterprise and Business Architect Lead
description:
*Join Accenture* *Strategy* *to* *drive**Enterprise**and Business* *Architecture**projects, and**lead our clients through their digital transformation journeys**.*

 **Are you the one?**


We are seeking experienced Enterprise and Business Architects to join our Technology Strategy team at Accenture in Stockholm.

  

You will join Sweden’s leading Technology Strategy group where you will be part of a dynamic team of ~30 professionals in Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö. In this team you will be able to take your expertise to the next level while also building a rewarding career. Your passion & talent will play a key role in advising top management in achieving greater business value from and through technology.


As an Enterprise and Business Architect in Accenture Technology Strategy, you will advise clients on how to drive and unlock business benefits and value by defining strategies and roadmaps through adoption and utilization of technology aligned to the business strategy. You will be leading business and technology teams in developing target architecture blueprints and ensure the tech stack is aligned with business objectives. You will be originating and driving projects related to strategy and architecture creation, orchestration of transformation programs, realizing and accelerating business opportunities and outcomes, and much more.

 **What you will be doing**

* Support executive management to identify and define value through better use of technologies and/or data, data platforms, automation and AI
* Create technology and/or data strategies, including analyzing the as-is situation, defining to-be targets, identify gaps and define prioritized roadmaps
* Lead business transformations where technology and/or data and automation are major components
* Support businesses developing their IT operating models
* Act as a value architect and entrepreneur both in terms of challenging traditional viewpoints at the client c-level, as well as building the Accenture business
* Actively work to identify and develop new business opportunities for Accenture, while at the same time delivering unmatched quality work for our clients
* Participate in the development and public communication of cutting-edge Point of Views
* Act as a business operator to drive our internal engagements and mentor our junior colleagues


#LI-EU


  

**Is this you?**

* Have 6+ years of relevant experience either from other consultancy companies, large business development or technology driven organizations, or hands on experience with optimizing IT functions.
* Experience from managing people in small to large teams.
* Experience from large and complex architectural project either as project manager or expert contributor.
* Passionate about digital transformation, technology strategy, and enterprise architecture with proven experience in these areas.
* Understanding of cloud platforms, AI services, and enterprise systems like SAP, Salesforce, Databricks, and Snowflake.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and influence stakeholders at all levels.
* Have experience with frameworks such as ITIL, DevOps, SAFe, COBIT or equivalent
* Experience with automation technologies and Generative AI. (a plus, but not required).
* Knowledge and experience with architectural frameworks such as TOGAF, Zachman, EA3 (a plus, but not required).
* Cloud certified (a plus, but not required).
* Hold a MSc in Business, Industrial Engineering, or equivalent.

If this sounds like an interesting role, we are eager to get your application!

  

Want to know more? Don’t hesitate to reach out to:


Olle Bergendahl (Strategy Manager), olle.bergendahl@accenture.com, +46 730513409


Konstantinos Manikas (Enterprise Architect Manager), konstantinos.manikas@accenture.com, +45 25288864

  

We are looking forward to hearing from you!
company_description: Our 721,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success.

title: Global DevOps team lead, Epiroc
description:
**Functional area:** Epiroc IT
**Onsite or Remote:** Hybrid
**Primary Skills:** Problem-solving,Coaching and Mentoring,Bias to Act
**Country/Region:** SE
**City:** Örebro
**Location:**Örebro, Orebro County, SE, 70191 Nacka, Stockholm County, SE, 131
**Company name:** Epiroc Rock Drills AB
**Date of posting:** Aug 14, 2024  

Are you passionate about driving technological advancements and empowering software development teams? Epiroc IT is looking for a driven Global DevOps Team Lead with a can-do attitude to join our Digital Development team.  


**About Epiroc**
Epiroc is a leading productivity partner for the mining, infrastructure, and natural resources industries. Using state-of-the-art technology, Epiroc develops and manufactures innovative drill rigs, rock excavation and construction machines, and delivers world-class service and consumables, as well as solutions for automation, digitalization and electrification. Epiroc is based in Stockholm, Sweden, had revenues of SEK 60 billion in 2023, and has around 18 000 passionate employees supporting and collaborating with customers in around 150 countries.  


**Your mission****As a Global DevOps Team Lead at Epiroc, you will:**  


* Be a part of our Digital Development team, dedicated to providing development teams with the tools they need to innovate efficiently.
* Interact with our development teams around the world, ensuring we base our recommendations and decisions on a good understanding of the day to day needs of the teams.
* Stay at the forefront of DevOps tools and processes, ensuring the adoption of best practices across the organization.
* Maintain consistent and well-managed DevOps tools and processes to streamline our development efforts.
* Support development teams in implementing new skills such as:
* AI assistant tools like GitHub Copilot
* Static code analysis
* License scanning of third-party libraries
* Vulnerability scanning of third-party libraries
* Secret scanning on the code base
* Evaluate future DevOps tools and processes, e.g. Microsoft DevBox, GitHub CodeSpaces, and other emerging technologies.
* Represent Epiroc in matters related to DevOps with our suppliers.

  


**Your profile**
We are looking for someone who is organized, independent, and thrives on structure. You should be customer-oriented and service-minded, with a strong desire to empower developers. You should hold a degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related field, accompanied by relevant Azure certifications. A passion for enabling developers to create outstanding solutions for our customers is essential. You must have solid experience in DevOps, including designing and implementing strategies for collaboration, code, infrastructure as code, security, compliance, continuous integration, testing, delivery, monitoring, and feedback. Additionally, a good understanding of Agile and Lean methodologies, along with the ability to design, build, test, and maintain cloud applications and services, is crucial. Since our corporate language is English, excellent verbal and written communication skills in English are required.  


**Location and travel**
The preferred locations for this position are Stockholm or Örebro, Sweden.  


**A hybrid workplace**Life at Epiroc can include the possibility for a hybrid workplace. It is a way of working that offers flexibility and participation allowing for a better balance between work and private life, which also promotes well-being. The hybrid workplace is an opportunity if work allows, based on your role, responsibilities, and individual conditions.  


**Life at Epiroc**
By joining our team, you can expect an atmosphere of creativity, innovation, and workplace diversity. You will be a part of a group of skilled and helpful colleagues who live by our core values: Collaboration, Commitment, and Innovation. We work in a global environment with over 113 different nationalities!  


In addition to the fact that we have a culture that is characterized by development combined with having a good balance between work and leisure, there are some things that makes us a little extra proud to work at Epiroc:  


* Global career opportunities
* Epiroc University, for your own competence development
* Community involvement
* Benefits package, which amongst other things include flexible working hours and bonus.

  


**Application and contact information**
Please send your application, including CV and personal letter, by creating an account in our recruitment system as soon as possible but no later than 2024-09-15. We review applications continually. Please note that due to regulations, we cannot handle applications received through email.  


For questions about the position please contact hiring manager: Bo Johansson, Manager Digital Development, bo.johansson@external.epiroc.com  

For questions about the recruitment process or application please contact: Nesrin.kaddoura@epiroc.com  

We have already made our choices regarding advertising channels and consulting providers, and kindly request not to be contacted regarding such inquiries.  



**Epiroc** is a global productivity partner for mining and construction customers, and accelerates the transformation toward a sustainable society. With ground-breaking technology, Epiroc develops and provides innovative and safe equipment, such as drill rigs, rock excavation and construction equipment and tools for surface and underground applications. The company also offers world-class service and other aftermarket support as well as solutions for automation, digitalization and electrification. Epiroc is based in Stockholm, Sweden, had revenues of more than SEK 60 billion in 2023, and has around 18 200 passionate employees supporting and collaborating with customers in around 150 countries. Learn more at www.epirocgroup.com.

title: Kan du VB.Net och vill ha en Tillsvidareanställnng?
description:
techlove AB har fått uppdraget av vår kund att hitta 2 stycken systemutvecklare inom VB.Net för tillsvidareanställning.
  
Vår kund vill anställa en utvecklare ASAP och den andra efter sommaren.
  
Vår kund går bra ekonomiskt och efterfrågan på deras tjänster växer.
  
Vår kund har sina kontakter och kunder framförallt i USA, Kanada och Tyskland.
  
I dagsläget finns befintliga system som både behöver underhållas och utveckla nya funktioner oftast i just VB.Net.
  
Vår kund är placerad i Köping. Att arbeta Remote till 100% är inga konstigheter, kanske kan man träffas någon gång över en bit mat med tillhörande dryck.
  
  

För att alla parter skall trivas är det viktigt att du som systemutvecklare är engagerad och vill vara med i processer och tänker själv och inte bara utför uppgifter som du får på skrivbordet.
  
Är det så att du arbetar Remote men känner att du vill har en liten arbetsplats så finns det lösningar på detta.
  
  

Nedan är mycket av det vi arbetar med idag.
  
Kan du bocka av en stor del av nedanstående tycker vi absolut att du skall skicka in en ansökan så tar vi det därifrån.
  
* Senior systemutvecklare inom VB.Net(fullstack)
* Typescript och Javascript
* SQL-Server och lite databasdesign.
* Vi är analytiska och självgående.
* Vi hjälps åt med Arkitektur, säkerhet och kodningsstandarder
* Svenska i tal och skrift eftersom dokumentation är på just Svenska.
* Kunskap i C#. Är det så at du är en vass C#-utvecklare men känner att du behöver lite matchning i VB.Net sä tar vår kund hand om det.
* Webforms
* GIS-system och Integrationer
* Google Maps, Javascript SDK
* Blazor
* MS Azure
* Azure DevOps CI/CD
* API-integrationer
* Utveckla RUST full API: s


Är du den person vi söker?
  
  

Har du några frågor eller funderingar är du sjlävklart välkommen att höra av dig till Karl Eriksson på 076-500 50 36.
  
  

Välkommen med din ansökan!
  
  

Vänligen
  
techlove AB

title: Senior Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
We are one of the key players in the Nordic region insurance field. Our IT unit takes care of insurance systems across the Baltics and Scandinavian countries. We are working with a broad scope of various in-house projects to keep our primary business growing. Furthermore, we consider ourselves Cloud citizens as our daily work revolves on top of cloud-based solutions. We are constantly growing. That's why we are looking for an addition to our team.  

About the role
In this role, you will be part of the IT Industrial Risk Systems team, which develops systems for our underwriters and risk engineers at If Industrial. As a senior quality assurance engineer, you will collaborate with experienced colleagues in a cross-functional agile development team, delivering significant value to our users in every sprint.
We develop and support complex business solutions used by major companies in the Nordics and thousands of clients globally. Our primary goal is to address the business needs effectively. We take pride in creating exceptional tools, solutions, and software for business purposes. In this role, you will utilize agile methodologies and logical thinking daily.
About the team
IT Industrial Risk Systems consists of four agile development teams. Each team consists of three to four developers and a quality assurance engineer who work together as a cross-functional agile team. The teams work in close collaboration with both product owners on the business side and architects to ensure that we deliver the right things in the right way.
We offer
In the same way that we place high demands on you as an employee, we also expect you to place high demands on us as an employer. Here are some of the benefits of working at If:* An including work environment where everyone is welcome
* Career and development opportunities in the biggest insurance company in the Nordics
* Social activities, as well as highly skilled professional environment
* Possibility of hybrid workplace
* Health promoting workplace with e.g., wellness allowance and various sports activities
* Great insurance benefits
* Lunch benefit
* High pension savings


Who are you?
You are passionate about your work and committed to ensuring high-quality deliveries, proactively seeking to improve quality at every stage of development. Your high degree of self-motivation and ability to incorporate feedback enable you to deliver the best possible outcomes within the given timeframe and scope.
You ensure the necessary quality level for software deliveries by identifying the test scope for systems, providing estimates of the test efforts required, and performing test planning for each iteration. You conduct and maintain sufficient test design, actively communicate with business users for requirements analysis and testing and own the test process by controlling the test scope and managing test deliverables. Additionally, you participate in the development of test automation scope and suggest improvements to enhance the overall testing process.
You also have:* Fluency in English
* High sense of responsibility and risk awareness
* Team player spirit with a natural appetite for learning, challenging yourself and sharing knowledge
* 5+ years of experience in software testing
* Higher education in QA methodologies or certifications within ISTQB
* Experience of working according to Agile principles
* Good technical competence – SQL selects, API testing.


Nice to have:* Azure DevOps knowledge
* Basic understanding of planet Azure
* Ability to read and understand C#
* Create tests in Gherkin syntaxis
* Knowledge of insurance domain


Additional facts and recruitment process
To apply for the position: Screening and interviewing will start immediately. However, application deadline is 30th of August 2024.  

Work location: Sweden (Bergshamra).  

Start: By agreement.  

  

For more information, please contact Johan Waessman, Delivery Manager, Risk Systems Domain, johan.waessman@if.se. Notice that we are not able to process any applications via email.  

  

Read more about our Tech Community at If and how we together create tech that matters: www.if.se/tech.  

  

Final candidates will undergo a background check before a job offer can be presented. In addition to references, candidates can also be checked via the internet and social media.  

  

We look forward to hearing from you!
company_description: We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encourages of dreams.

title: Embedded DevOps Engineer
description:
LumenRadio is a high-tech company with the vision of replacing all cables in the world. We have been leading the wireless transformation within the lighting industry since 2008, where our technology today is being used every day in productions ranging from the largest movie productions in Hollywood to large evens such as the Coachella festival and the Eurovision Song Contest. Our patented technology provide unprecedented reliability for the most business-critical applications and our products are now also being used in building automation solutions, heavy industry applications, street lighting as well as indoor lighting control for commercial buildings.
  
About the Platforms team
  
The Platforms team at LumenRadio consists of dedicated engineers, laying a stable foundation for LumenRadio's product portfolio. The team selects, refines and develops technology into a platform used by our product development teams. Taking on a strategic technical responsibility ranging from hardware to software, the team ensures the future development of our tech stack and products. The Platforms team is responsible for developing our proprietary low-power network stack and embedded OSMira. We proudly claim that Mira is the world's most reliable and energy-efficient mesh network, made possible by our patented technology for adaptive frequency hopping. Your future
  
We are currently seeking an Embedded DevOps Engineer to oversee our test environment, test processes, unit tests, HIL tests, and test beds. You will play a central role, supporting the entire R&D department and influencing our quality and test practices significantly. With our unique products and technologies, there are few ready-made test solutions available. As such, you will be the expert in identifying and developing the best and most suitable solutions.
  
You will be part of a cross-functional team that includes Embedded Software Developers, Electronics Design Engineers, and a Production Test Engineer, all focusing extensively on quality. In our R&D department, all engineers share responsibility for QA without a dedicated department. This positions you as the frontline leader in QA efforts, collaborating closely with various product development teams to innovate and implement solutions based on your expertise.
  
Your primary goal will be to increase automation and test coverage. Given the dynamic nature of our products built on Mira Mesh, which features constantly changing configurations, highly efficient testing processes are crucial.
  
About you
  
We believe you are someone who dares to drive change. You possess strong self-leadership and have a genuine desire to make a significant impact by leading the sharing of knowledge and best practices throughout the entire organization.
  
With experience not only in operational testing but also in strategic DevOps development, we expect you to effectively promote your ideas that enhance efficiency. To succeed in the role, we expect you to have:
  
A B.Sc or M.Sc in computer science, electrical engineering, or a related field.
  
Experience with test automation related to the embedded/hardware-related field.
  
Knowledge of CI/CD principles.
  
Proficiency with Git.
  
Scripting experience in Python and/or Bash or similar.
  
Familiarity with Embedded systems; advantageous to have knowledge of embedded C, but we’re primarily seeking general understanding.
  
  

**Preferred qualifications:**  

General knowledge of Linux, particularly Ubuntu and Debian.
  
Familiarity with various Python testlibraries such as Robot and Behave.
  
Experience with Gitlab CI.
  
Experience with Docker.
  
  

Our tech stack
  
Whatever OS and editor that make you productive
  
Arm-gcc, git, GNU make, python
  
Robot Framework, GitLab and GitLab CI
  
**Our own meshing network stack MiraMesh:** UDP
  
IPv6
  
RPL mesh routing
  
6LoWPAN
  
Bluetooth radios
  
  

Diversity and culture
  
We are on a mission to replace all cables in the world, and we are looking for you who share our passion for cutting-edge technology! We value diversity and welcome different-minded professionals who are committed to our ambitious goals. We warmly welcome and encourage job applications from people of all backgrounds and genders.
  
If you need any adjustments to support you with your application, just let us know by emailing nelly.bertilsson@lumenradio.com.
  
Our Benefits
  
We offer good job security through agreements and insurance, paid parental leave, holiday leave, and attractive pension plans
  
Yearly health allowance - For your physical activity and well-being
  
Yearly personal development allowance - For your brain and creativity
  
Free access to the gym in the same building
  
Flexible working hours
  
Not to mention our coffee club, lunch run, "Among Us" tournaments, and much more!
  
  

More information
  
This is a full-time position at our Head Office in Gothenburg. In this position, you will report to our CTO, Johannes Arvidsson, and responsible recruiter is Nelly Bertilsson. Don't hesitate to reach out to nelly.bertilsson@lumenradio.com if you have any questions.
  
Please note that we will not be processing applications during the summer period; we will resume our review process in August.
  
We kindly ask not to be contacted for external recruitment services for this recruitment process.
